text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/92bb83e41ca42d0d00d21753810d92485c808a50|patch 8.2.2465: using freed memory in :psearch>
patch 8.2.2465: using freed memory in :psearch

Problem:    Using freed memory in :psearch. (houyunsong)
Solution:   Check the current window is still valid.  Fix flaky test.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2465: using freed memory in :psearch · vim/vim@92bb83e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2465: using freed memory in :psearch · vim/vim@92bb83e
attachments.text: Problem: Using freed memory in :psearch. (houyunsong) Solution: Check the current window is still valid. Fix flaky test.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/8ab375706e6712308f8cf7529bcae56684a6f385|patch 8.2.2464: using freed memory if window closed in autocommand>
patch 8.2.2464: using freed memory if window closed in autocommand

Problem:    Using freed memory if window closed in autocommand. (houyunsong)
Solution:   Check the window still exists.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6bcb877ec19a647443195a54eeac60cb693fd827|patch 8.2.2463: using :arglocal in an autocommand may use freed memory>
patch 8.2.2463: using :arglocal in an autocommand may use freed memory

Problem:    Using :arglocal in an autocommand may use freed memory.
            (houyunsong)
Solution:   Check if the arglist is locked.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2463: using :arglocal in an autocommand may use freed memory · vim/vim@6bcb877
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2463: using :arglocal in an autocommand may use freed memory · vim/vim@6bcb877
attachments.text: Problem: Using :arglocal in an autocommand may use freed memory. (houyunsong) Solution: Check if the arglist is locked.

patch 8.2.2462: Coverity warns for not checking for fseek() error

Problem:    Coverity warns for not checking for fseek() error.
Solution:   Give an error message if fseek() fails.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.2462: Coverity warns for not checking for fseek() error · vim/vim@2c363a2
attachments.text: Problem: Coverity warns for not checking for fseek() error. Solution: Give an error message if fseek() fails.

Solution:   Add "(void)" to avoid the warning.

patch 8.2.2460: Coverity warns for unused value

Problem:    Coverity warns for unused value.
Solution:   Do not reset the return value to OK.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.2460: Coverity warns for unused value · vim/vim@fc1dafa
attachments.text: Problem: Coverity warns for unused value. Solution: Do not reset the return value to OK.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/2e5910bfbb05957c10c9c69756dfa342557e9a8b|patch 8.2.2455: Vim9: key type for literal dict and indexing is incon…>
patch 8.2.2455: Vim9: key type for literal dict and indexing is inconsistent

Problem:    Vim9: key type that can be used for literal dict and indexing is
            inconsistent.
Solution:   Allow using number and bool as key for a literal dict. (#7771)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2455: Vim9: key type for literal dict and indexing is incon… · vim/vim@2e5910b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2455: Vim9: key type for literal dict and indexing is incon… · vim/vim@2e5910b
attachments.text: …sistent Problem: Vim9: key type that can be used for literal dict and indexing is inconsistent. Solution: Allow using number and bool as key for a literal dict. (#7771)

Solution:   Add "lead:" to 'listchars'. (closes #7772)
